message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS

This paper belongs to the field of natural language processing and information retrieval, which is covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. The use of keyphrases and centroid approach suggests that cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The use of machine learning techniques for summarization also suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The focus on summarization and extraction of important sentences suggests cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the use of techniques for weighing sentences and documents suggests cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
